name: End of Days
description: End of Days is a low poly stylized zombie survival game inspired by games like "Nazi Zombies", "Dead Rising", and "left 4 Dead". End of Days aims to be an immersive survival experience where you may explore, craft, customize and strategize ways to mow down hordes of the undead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6900K, AMD Ryzen 7 1800X Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX Vega 64, or better DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection
